name: douggr/emyi
description: Sleek, intuitive and powerful PHP framework for faster and easier web development

suggest.ext-zip: Enabling the zip extension allows you to unzip archives, and allows gzip compression of all internet traffic
suggest.ext-intl: ext/intl for i18n features (included in default builds of PHP)
suggest.ext-openssl: Enabling the openssl extension allows you to access https URLs for repositories and packages
